FLStodck biomass metrics

Source: R/FLStock.R
dot-biomass.Rd

FLStodck biomass metrics

Usage

.biomass(n, h, ph, m, pm, wt, sel, byage = FALSE)

Examples

data(ple4)
# SSB at spawning time
ssb(ple4)
#> An object of class "FLQuant"
#> , , unit = unique, season = all, area = unique
